description: This operation updates a data set.

parameters.name: DataSetId
parameters.description: The unique identifier for a data set.

nested_items.name: Arn
nested_items.description: The ARN for the data set.

nested_items.name: AssetType
nested_items.description: The type of asset that is added to a data set.

nested_items.name: CreatedAt
nested_items.description: The date and time that the data set was created, in ISO 8601 format.

nested_items.name: Description
nested_items.description: The description for the data set.

nested_items.name: Id
nested_items.description: The unique identifier for the data set.

nested_items.name: Name
nested_items.description: The name of the data set.

nested_items.name: Origin
nested_items.description: A property that defines the data set as OWNED by the account (for providers) or ENTITLED to the account (for subscribers).

nested_items.name: OriginDetails
nested_items.description: If the origin of this data set is ENTITLED, includes the details for the product on AWS Marketplace.

nested_items.name: ProductId
nested_items.description: The product ID of the origin of the data set.

nested_items.name: DataGrantId
nested_items.description: The ID of the data grant.

nested_items.name: SourceId
nested_items.description: The data set ID of the owned data set corresponding to the entitled data set being viewed. This parameter is returned when a data set owner is viewing the entitled copy of its owned data set.

nested_items.name: UpdatedAt
nested_items.description: The date and time that the data set was last updated, in ISO 8601 format.
